name: China Economic Miracle Presentation
description:
October 1 marks the 73rd year of the founding of the People's Republic of China in China. In this presentation, I will try to understand how during this time the PRC has turned from a poor agrarian country into an economic superpower.


“China was a very poor country when the Communist Party came to power. The country had neither trading partners nor diplomatic contacts. She could only rely on herself,” says Chris Leung, chief China economist at Hong Kong bank DBS.


Over the past 40 years, China has implemented a series of market reforms that have opened up the country to trade and foreign investment, lifting hundreds of millions of people out of poverty.


You can contact me by mail ritetus@gmail.com. In the title, write the word «PRESENTATION».
